info.title: RB Mailer
info.description: Configure all mail proccedures from redback.gr mail server for predifined account such as support, info, admin

parameter.name: $account
parameter.description: The email login account name, which crendential will be used for class interaction.

parameter.name: $optionSetType
parameter.description: The type of configuration set send : to enable send mail options recieve : to enable recieve mail options both : to enable both, send and recieve mail options

method.name: loadPredefinedOptionset
method.description: Given the optionset name and type configures mailer class accordingly

parameter.name: $optionSetName
parameter.description: The account name that class will load / configure

parameter.name: $optionSetType
parameter.description: The type of configuration set send : to enable send mail options recieve : to enable recieve mail options both : to enable both, send and recieve mail options

method.name: getCommonOptionset
method.description: Returns the common option set for all redback mail accounts

method.name: initPredefinedOptionset
method.description: Initalizes all available option sets for redback mail accounts

method.name: get_crendentials
method.description: Load crendentials using redback settings class for the given account
